mapper.update: UPDATE INTO movie (user_id, subject, url) VALUES (#{request.streamerId}, #{request.subject}, #{request.url})
mapper.select: SELECT INTO live_streaming (user_id, movie_id, title, contents, reserved_at) VALUES (#{request.streamerId},#{request.movieId}, #{request.title}, #{request.contents}, #{request.reservedTime})
SELECT id, title from liveStreaming where userId = #{request.streamerId} ;
